column5: I am curious is there is any good fishing near Winnipeg? I am being sent there from MN for work for a month and will need something to do on the weekends. Any open water (rivers) or would it be ice fishing? Also, the name of a guide would be appreciated. Also, if you have been there, are there any must see things or great restaurants that I need to check out? Thanks in advance:)
Goldpig:There's great Ice fishing in a few weeks - when are you up here? Email me and I'll fill you in on the details...
